mapper.insert: insert into employee (emp_id, emp_name, emp_no, emp_address, emp_email, emp_joined,annual_leave,emp_pwd,profile,emp_phone,dept_code,position_value,view_auth) values (#{empId},#{empName},#{empNo},#{empAddress},#{empEmail},#{empJoined},#{annualLeave},#{empPwd},#{profile},#{empPhone},#{deptCode},#{positionValue},#{viewAuth})
mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_id AS empId, e.emp_name AS empName, e.emp_no AS empNo, e.emp_address AS empAddress, e.emp_email AS empEmail, e.emp_joined AS empJoined, e.annual_leave AS annualLeave, e.used_annual_leave as usedAnnualLeave, e.emp_pwd AS empPwd, e.profile AS profile, e.emp_phone AS empPhone, e.dept_code AS deptCode, d.dept_name AS deptName, e.position_value AS positionValue, p.position_name AS positionName, e.view_auth AS viewAuth FROM employee e , tbl_dept d, tbl_position p WHERE e.dept_code = d.dept_code and e.position_value = p.position_value and emp_id = #{username}
SELECT dept_name FROM tbl_dept WHERE dept_code = #{deptCode};
SELECT position_name FROM tbl_position where position_value = #{positionValue};
mapper.update:

emp_email = #{email},
emp_phone = #{phone},
emp_address = #{address},
